name: RepaTiti
description:
A music game. two players need to cooperate together for repairing scores. We made in Global Game Jam 2020.

DaDa is a famous musician. Although he is almost retired recently, DaDa is still immersed in playing his favorite songs. However, DaDa is too old to remember all the notes on the sheet. 

Fortunately, there are music elf Repa and Titi! They can help Da to put all the right note into a complete sheet and playing marvelous melody. *A special music game. two players need to cooperate together to repair DaDa's score and memory for what he loves.

Playing Instruction

Player 1

key [W] to move up
key [S] to move down
key [A] to change score type
key [D] to launch score

Player 2

key [arrorw up] to move up
key [arrow down] to move down
key [arrow right] to change score type
key [arrow left] to launch score
